---
name: New book issue template
about: To create a new database record for the book database.
title: enter-isbn13-here
labels: book
assignees: ''

---

Upon finding a valid **ISBN in the title**, closing this will generate a new database entry for the according book by querying https://openlibrary.org/ for metadata. You may insert values for the metadata fields below, if you don't, they are created empty and have to be filled later.

# Metadata

- review date: `YYYY-MM-DD`
- proposer: `namehere`
- participants: `namehere, namehere2, namehere3`
